column2: Tindak Malaysia (2025), Lapuran Pilihanraya Umum Dewan Undangan Negeri Sarawak 1983, Government Gazette P.U. (B) 645 22/12/1983,  Almanak keputusan pilihan raya umum : Parlimen & Dewan Undangan Negeri, 1959-1999 (Anzagain Sdn Bhd), Iban politics and economic development: Their patterns and change (Jayum Jawan). For more information, please refer to SARAWAK_1983_Other_Sources_DUN_File

There are gaps in the age data for the candidates. SNAP is part of the BN government, but for this election, it is treated as a separate entity. PBDS (breakaway of SNAP)attempted to join BN before the elections but was blocked by a veto from SNAP. SNAP and PBDS contested under their banner and not using the BN banner, Taib Mahmud, then Chief Minister, formulated BN Plus government which includes BN (PBB, SUPP, SNAP) and PBDS. Independents won for this election were aligned to certain political parties (for Bengoh, aligned to PBB, Engkilili and Dudong Independent winners aligned to SUPP and for Tatau, initially contested as independent, later supported PBDS). TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or omissions arising from the original data or its derivatives.
